data.title: Maksim Chmerkovskiy
data.meta_description: Get the latest maksim chmerkovskiy news, articles, videos and photos on Page Six.
data.text:
'DWTS' pros Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy welcome their third baby

The dancers became parents in 2017 when son Shai arrived. After suffering multiple miscarriages, Murgatroyd gave birth to rainbow baby Rio in 2023.

Pregnant Peta Murgatroyd straps watermelons on Maksim Chmerkovskiy so he understands how 'huge' she feels

Murgatroyd — who is 36 weeks pregnant with the couple's third child — makes him do simple tasks while the watermelon is strapped to his belly so he understands pregnancy.

Watch ‘SYTYCD’ contestants excitedly react to JoJo Siwa being announced as surprise third judge

Page Six is exclusively premiering a sneak peek clip from Monday’s all-new episode, which features the Top 10 dancers meeting the “Dance Moms” alum for the first time.

'So You Think You Can Dance' judge Maksim Chmerkovskiy teaches us dance moves

Maksim Chmerkovskiy stopped by the Page Six studio to teach staffers some sexy dance moves. The "So You Think You Can Dance" judge and "Dancing With The Stars" alum breaks...

Maksim Chmerkovskiy is excited for Ariana Madix's 'Chicago' casting versus past untrained celebs joining the production

"So You Think You Can Dance" judge Maksim Chmerkovskiy stopped by the Page Six studios to show us some dance moves and sit down for a chat. The doting father...

'DWTS' pro Peta Murgatroyd is pregnant, expecting baby No. 3 with Maks Chmerkovskiy 7 months after giving birth

"This was very unexpected," the Australian dancer admitted, noting she fell pregnant just four months after giving birth to her rainbow baby, Rio.

'DWTS' alum Lacey Schwimmer: Maksim Chmerkovskiy, Louis van Amstel's comments about my weight 'ruined me'

"No one should ever discredit somebody based off of their appearance," she said, adding that Chmerkovskiy and van Amstel "broke [her] spirit."

'DWTS' alum Maksim Chmerkovskiy supports 'single' and 'hot' Mauricio Umansky, Emma Slater holding hands

"I wish them nothing but butterflies and all the best," Chmerkovskiy said of Kyle Richards' estranged husband and his ballroom partner.

‘Dancing With the Stars’ pros explain how emotional Len Goodman tribute came to be: ‘Everyone was in tears’

Choreographer Jenna Johnson, along with Maksim Chmerkovskiy, Artem Chigvintsev, Sasha Farber and more, spoke to Page Six about the emotional waltz they performed in honor of the late head judge.

Peta Murgatroyd pokes fun at postpartum sex with Maksim Chmerkovskiy after baby No. 2

"Let's get jiggy with it shall we," Murgatroyd wrote, nearly two months after she and her fellow "Dancing With the Stars" pro welcomed son Rio.

Peta Murgatroyd, Maksim Chmerkovskiy reveal rainbow baby's name, give first look: 'Life is good'

"We are overjoyed to share our baby boy with all of you," the dancing pro said, adding their 6-year-old son Shai "is already the best big brother."

Peta Murgatroyd welcomes rainbow baby with Maksim Chmerkovskiy

The "Dancing With the Stars" pros became parents in January 2017 when son Shai arrived. Murgatroyd subsequently suffered multiple pregnancy losses.

Maksim Chmerkovskiy, Peta Murgatroyd reveal the sex of baby No. 2

The "Dancing with the Stars" pros announced the sex of baby No. 2 with the help of their 6-year-old son, Shai.

Pregnant Peta Murgatroyd re-creates Rihanna's Super Bowl halftime show

"We just couldn't help it!" the "Dancing With the Stars" pro wrote, adding that her and Maskim Chmerkovskiy's 6-year-old son, Shai, "stole the show."

Peta Murgatroyd flaunts growing baby bump: 'I'm more confident than ever'

Murgatroyd revealed she suffered three miscarriages in the span of two years and underwent one round of IFV before announcing she was pregnant again.

Peta Murgatroyd is pregnant, expecting rainbow baby with Maksim Chmerkovskiy

The "Dancing With the Stars" pros, who are already parents of 6-year-old son Shai, suffered multiple miscarriages while trying to conceive their second baby.

Scientologists believed Kirstie Alley had reached 'superhuman' status

Alley announced reaching her top-tier status in Scientology in 2018, saying, “Now here I stand a new OT VIII, shiny, fresh, and calm."

Maksim Chmerkovskiy reflects on 'wild' friendship with Kirstie Alley after her death

The pair remained good friends after competing together on Season 12 of "Dancing With the Stars" before getting into a fight on Twitter last year.

Pregnant Jenna Johnson, Val Chmerkovskiy reveal sex of first baby

"Today we are officially halfway there," Johnson gushed to her Instagram followers. "Saying those words still makes me emotional!! SO EXCITED."

Peta Murgatroyd reveals IVF transfer didn’t work

"I had to wrap my head around the fact that I had spent months preparing for this and I came out with nothing. I left empty-handed."
